data.author: Jacob Perron
data.message:
Move dependencies to rosidl_core and depend on action_msgs (#22)

Move implementation to new packages rosidl_core_generators and rosidl_runtime_generators

The new packages are located in a separate repository: https://github.com/ros2/rosidl_core.git

rosidl_defaults now depends on the new packages, plus message definitions required for Actions (namely action_msgs).

This allows users to avoid having to explictly depend on action_msgs.

Signed-off-by: Jacob Perron <jacob@openrobotics.org>

Drop rosidl_typesupport packages from previous repository. (#1)

This repository was split from the repository
<https://github.com/ros2/rosidl_typesupport>

data.author: Steven! Ragnarök
data.message:
Merge pull request #26 from ros2/remove-direct-vendor-typesupport-deps

Remove direct dependencies on vendor typesupport packages.

data.author: Steven! Ragnarök
data.message:
Remove direct dependencies on vendor typesupport packages.

The vendor typesupport packages are exported by
rosidl_typesupport_c{,pp} if needed and available.

The vendor typesupport packages are members in the respective groups
rosidl_typesupport_c{,pp}_packages and thus will still be directly
depended upon by this package for source builds.

data.author: Mikael Arguedas
data.message:
fix and test default values for all generators (#165)

* WIP: hacking on default value parsing

* fix byte and char assignment

* string array default values

* revert useless changes

* Revert "string array default values"

This reverts commit cc90499b454c40e83cabdbbc5141fd2b396c0ccc.

* added todo for string arrays

* add cpp tests for default and constants

* add some byte char constants and homogenize test API calls

* use ASSERT_STREQ for string checking

* add bounded string array testing

* don't generate code for unused msg files

* follow style guideline for condition checking

* fix warning

* fix warning round 2

* use single quotes

* use single quotes

* update assert

* use cross language compatible float value

* homogenize float values across languages

data.author: William Woodall
data.message:
add type support introspection specific headers

Like the custom headers provided by the connext
and opensplice implementations, the
rosidl_typesupport_introspection_cpp package
provides a generic interface for getting the
type support handle. This is used by the
rmw_connext_xtypes_dynamic_cpp package. This
also fixes linking on Windows.

data.author: William Woodall
data.message: move the visibility header

data.author: William Woodall
data.message: add macros and use them to fix linking on Windows

data.author: William Woodall
data.message:
change how the impl specific header is included

previously it was included along side this header
by other headers, but now it is tail included to
simplify the pattern. The tail included header,
rosidl_generator_cpp/
get_type_support_handle_impl.hpp
is actually provided by the DDS vendor specific
implementations, not by rosidl_generator_cpp, but
this namespace is used because they each provide
a version of the same header, and only one can
be included.

data.author: William Woodall
data.message:
move typesupport_introspection_identifier to .h

It was changed to a static variable in a header
from a extern declaration with an exported
symbol. This allows us to get rid of a shared
library and still only has the symbol defined
once.
